text: Ki tumhi, ya (bala) la lakadi petita thevuna tila banda karuna nadita soduna dya, maga nadi tya petila kinaryavara ne'ila ani majha va tyaca svatahca satru tila ghe'ila ani mi apalyatarphe visesa prema ani pasantica tumacyavara varsava kela yasathi ki tumace palanaposana majhya dolyadekhata kele jave
